Slash Search: Your Universal Search Shortcut

Inspired by YouTube and GitHub's popular '/' search feature, now available everywhere!

Slash Search seamlessly integrates into your browsing routine, saving you time and frustration. Whether you're shopping, researching, or just surfing the web, find what you're looking for faster than ever.
